        [0, 200, 200, 100]
      ]
    }

}

      "drawsContent": true,
      "repaintRects": [
        [200, 0, 100, 300],
        [0, 0, 300, 300]
      ]
    }
  ]
}

        [0, 250, 300, 50]
      ]
    }
  ]
}
